title: Notwithstanding anything contained in these Regulations, residential/commercial uses otherwise permissible, independent of road width to which it abuts shall be permissible on the Govt
clause_text: Notwithstanding anything contained in these Regulations, residential/commercial uses otherwise permissible, independent of road width to which it abuts shall be permissible on the Govt./Semi- Govt./Appropriate Authorityâ€™s share of land. 15% of admissible FSI on AH plot shall be exclusively used for the purpose of convenient shops for use of residential occupants of layout
